Author: Bomby57
Text: Purging increases the risk of stomach acidity. I would advise checking that out because that will evolve into 24/7 pain but it's super easy to resolve. Stress, sodas and purging will increase the problem as well as acidic food (green apples, some candies, spicy food, etc). Things that can damp the pain are milk (if you're not intolerant), bread and high fat items with 0 seasoning, like tuna or oil.
